data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 2, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Jung Won-jin gives Sangju Sangmu a 0-1 lead.
Ulsan Hyundai takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 10, Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
Geun-ho Lee (Sangju Sangmu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Park Jeong-in (Ulsan Hyundai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Ulsan Hyundai surge into the attack at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium but Junior Negraoâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai's Yoon Bit-garam is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Sangju Sangmu push forward at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium and Jung Won-jin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ulsan Hyundai defence.
Byung jin Park awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Ulsan Ulsan Hyundai drive forward through Yoon Bit-garam. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 28, Sangju Sangmu's Jung Won-jin breaks free at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Goal! Seung-hyun Jung (Ulsan Hyundai) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Hong Chul to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 36, Seung-hyun Jung is on target to give Ulsan Hyundai a 2-1 advantage.
Park Jeong-in with an assist there.
In the minute 38, Byung jin Park awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Byung jin Park signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 43, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Important block from the Ulsan Hyundai defence as Lee Dong-su fires in a strike for Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 45, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Bjorn Johnsen is on a sub for Park Jeong-in for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 48, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Sangju Sangmu drive upfield and Geun-ho Lee gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ulsan Hyundai defender.
In the minute 50, Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Park Dong-jin is replacing Oh Se-Hun for the away team.
In the minute 55, Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Junior Negrao of Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, Byung jin Park awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai pushes forward through Junior Negrao, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's now 3-1 in Ulsan as Bjorn Johnsen scores for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Hong Chul.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Byung jin Park signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
The away team replace Jung Won-jin with Jeong Jae-Hee.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu attack but Park Dong-jin's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
In the minute 67, Byung jin Park signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai's Bjorn Johnsen fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 70, Sangju Sangmu's Park Dong-jin gets in a shot on goal at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Kim Do-Hoon (Ulsan Hyundai) is making a second substitution, with Lee Keun-ho replacing Junior Negrao.
In the minute 72, In Ulsan, Kim Min-hyeok of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai's Lee Keun-ho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai move into a more comfortable 4-1 lead. Bjorn Johnsen is the scorer with a header!
Lee Keun-ho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 80, Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
The home team have replaced Hong Chul with Jeong Hoon-sung. This is the third substitution made today by Kim Do-Hoon.
In the minute 82, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Ulsan.
Sangju Sangmu have been given a penalty...
In the minute 83, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu are awarded a penalty ... Geun-ho Lee botches the spot kick!
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 86, Geun-ho Lee for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Ulsan Hyundai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Byung jin Park awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Ulsan.
The match is over. Final score 4-1.
Kim Tae-wan is making the team's third substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Song Seung-min replacing Geun-ho Lee.
